item.title: Broadcom Inks OpenAI Deal: Why It's A Huge Win for AVGO Stock
item.description: Broadcom just added ChatGPT maker OpenAI to its list of high-profile AI customers. Many analysts now see shares going to $400 or more.

item.title: This Less-Hyped Tech Stock Could Be the Key to the Next AI Wave
